description: The department of FOREIGN DEFENSE department has a request for a sleeping bag which has following specifications: Item 1, GSIN :8465 NIN:8445-20-004-72, Sleeping bag Quantity: 25, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal Item 2, GSIN: 8465 NSN: 8465-20-004-72, Sleeping bag Quantity: 25, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Details

### Announcement Title
*- Sleeping Bag*

### Reference Number
*- CB-686-8349011-*

### Solicitation Number
*- W8485-258220/A-*

### Publication Date
*- 2024-06-25-*

### Tender Closing Date
*- 2024-07-26T14:00:00-*

### Amendment Number
*- 1-*

### Amendment Date
*- 2024-07-02-*

### Contracting Entity Name
*- National Defence Headquarters-*
*- Quartier général de la Défense nationale*

### Contact Information
*- MCpl Poissant-Viau-
*- audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca-*
*- 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada-*

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the delivery of sleeping bags, detailed below:

### Item 1

* Quantity: 25
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Destination: 25 Canadian Forces Support Squadron (CFSSD) Montreal
* National Stock Number (NSN): 8465-20-004-7461
* Global Supply System (GSIN): 8465
* Part Number: ID-08-280
* North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) Commercial and Government Entity (NCAGE): L09L7

### Item 2

* Quantity: 25
* Unit of Issue: Each
* Destination: 7 Canadian Forces Support Squadron (CFSSD) Edmonton
* National Stock Number (NSN): 8465-20-004-7461
* Global Supply System (GSIN): 8465
* Part Number: ID-08-280
* North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) Commercial and Government Entity (NCAGE): L09L7

Criteria for Preference:

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model or part number, and the NCAGE they are offering.

Evaluation Process:

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Language:

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Trade Agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

Region of Opportunity:
*- World-*

Region of Delivery:
*- Quebec (excluded: National Capital Region) Alberta-*


Let me know if you want me to add any thing.
